articles.title: What is a blighted ovum? Causes, symptoms and treatment - AsiaOne
articles.description:
What is a blighted ovum?

A blighted ovum happens when a fertilised egg attaches itself to the uterine wall, but the embryo does not develop. Cells develop to form the pregnancy sac, but not the embryo itself. In normal cases, when a woman becomes pregnant,…
